snippet: The Posse Foundation, which sends students from large urban school districts to elite colleges, is coming to Texas in the 2012-13 academic year.
lead_paragraph: The Posse Foundation, which sends students from large urban school districts to elite colleges, is coming to Texas in the 2012-13 academic year.

headline.seo: The Posse Foundation Comes to Houston for the 2012-13 School Year
headline.main: Program That Sends Urban Students to Elite Colleges Comes to Houston This Fall
headline.print_headline: Program That Sends Urban Students to Elite Colleges Comes to Houston This Fall
